title: How long does it take for riot support to solve your problem
body: I sent a ticket to riot support 8 days ago. Got a replied but they did not solve the problem. Btw 4 days in and I have no access to my game account. I'm kinda upset. Riot please help me!!!

replies.body:
Feel like riot does not give a shit about me. Been waiting for week now still no answer. But 
i see other people got their answer in sec. wtf is going on?? All I need is my account back!!

Account recoveries take quite a bit of investigating to ensure we're recovering it to the right person. On top of that, we've had a lot of support tickets come at us lately, so response times are a bit longer than normal.

If you're still experiencing issues getting a reply, provide me with your ticket # and I'll take a look.
basically the shittiest support team i've came across. and i seriously mean that.
